ygData.subject: AW: dueling tips
ygData.msgSnippet: if fearing is allowed, sing fearsong. opponent will run to middle of arena and stand ther until he dies by your weapons. i did that in team pvp and almost
ygData.messageBody:
if fearing is allowed, sing fearsong. opponent will run to middle of arena
and stand ther until he dies by your weapons. i did that in team pvp and
almost killed the whole other group on my own, and also some spectators that
were standing too near and got feared too ;) just killed everything in the
middle of the arena, wasnt paying attention if it was a member of the other
group, hehe.

otherwise, sing resistance against caster (ench, cleric, ...) and use snare
to slow and bellow to interrupt.

good luck!
tobi
lvl 45 smurf
<tod und teufel>
tholuxe paells



Date: Mon, 7 May 2001 01:26:28 -0700 (PDT)
From: Bill Costlow <atlatyl@...>
Subject: dueling tips


My guild is holding a "Duelmania" event at the Arena near Lake Rathetear
this Sunday. I've come very close to dueling in the past, but never have.
If anyone has good advice to share about this, I'd be grateful.



Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
Bard of 41 songs
